Auth.checkEmail: Check your email for verification instructions
Auth.createAccountDescription: Create your account to get started with this boilerplate
Auth.signInDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
Auth.organizationNameHint: Create an organization or leave blank to join later
Auth.signinFailed: Sign in failed. Please try again.
Auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
Auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
Auth.verificationEmailSent: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to verify your account.
Auth.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before signing in

HomePage.title: Welcome to this boilerplate
HomePage.subtitle: Your comprehensive platform for managing users and organizations
HomePage.description: Streamline your workflow with our powerful user and organization management tools

welcome.subject: Welcome to {appName}!
welcome.title: üéâ Welcome to {appName}!
welcome.congratulations: Congratulations! Your email has been verified and your {appName} account is now active. We're excited to have you on board and can't wait to see what you'll build with our platform.
welcome.nextSteps: Here's what you can do next:
welcome.step1: Explore your dashboard - Get familiar with your new workspace
welcome.step2: Set up your profile - Add your information and preferences
welcome.step3: Create your first project - Start building something amazing
welcome.step4: Invite your team - Collaborate with colleagues and friends
welcome.feature1Description: Built for performance with enterprise-grade infrastructure
welcome.feature2Description: Your data is protected with industry-standard security
welcome.feature3Description: Work together seamlessly with real-time collaboration tools
welcome.feature4Description: Track your progress with detailed analytics and reports
welcome.support: Need help getting started? Our support team is here to help! You can reach us anytime, and we typically respond within 24 hours.
welcome.footer: You're receiving this email because you successfully created an account on {appName}. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.title: Verify your email address
verification.description: Thanks for signing up for {appName}! To complete your account setup and ensure you receive important updates, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
verification.alternativeLink: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.linkExpiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.
verification.noAccount: If you didn't create an account with {appName}, you can safely ignore this email.
verification.footer: You're receiving this email because someone signed up for {appName} using this email address.

invitation.subject: You've been invited to join {appName}
invitation.title: You've been invited!
invitation.description: Join thousands of users who are already using {appName} to streamline their workflow and boost productivity.
invitation.alternativeLink: If the button above doesn't work, you can also copy and paste this link into your browser:
invitation.linkExpiry: This invitation link will expire in 7 days.
invitation.footer: You're receiving this email because {inviterName} invited you to join {appName}.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.title: Reset your password
passwordReset.description: We received a request to reset your password. To proceed, please click the button below.

Errors.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists

AuthUI.DELETE_ORGANIZATION_INSTRUCTIONS: Enter the organization slug to continue:
AuthUI.DELETE_ORGANIZATION_DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove your organization and all of its contents. This action is not reversible ‚Äî please continue with caution.

AuthUI.PENDING_INVITATIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage pending invitations to your organization.
AuthUI.UPDATE_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: Update the role for this member
AuthUI.INVITE_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: Send an invitation to add a new member to your organization.
AuthUI.MEMBERS_INSTRUCTIONS: Invite new members to your organization.
AuthUI.MEMBERS_DESCRIPTION: Add or remove members and manage their roles.
AuthUI.REMOVE_MEMBER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?
AuthUI.LEAVE_ORGANIZATION_SUCCESS: You have successfully left the organization.
AuthUI.LEAVE_ORGANIZATION_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to leave this organization?

AuthUI.BY_CONTINUING_YOU_AGREE: By continuing, you agree to the
AuthUI.PROTECTED_BY_RECAPTCHA: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA.
AuthUI.LOGO_INSTRUCTIONS: A logo is optional but strongly recommended.
AuthUI.LOGO_DESCRIPTION: Click on the logo to upload a custom one from your files.
AuthUI.SESSION_NOT_FRESH: Your session is not fresh. Please sign in again.
AuthUI.VERIFY_YOUR_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: Please verify your email address. Check your inbox for the verification email. If you haven't received the email, click the button below to resend.
AuthUI.USERNAME_DESCRIPTION: Enter the username you want to use to log in.
AuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_TOTP_LABEL: Scan the QR Code with your Authenticator
AuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_ENABLE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter your password to enable 2FA
AuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_DISABLE_INSTRUCTIONS: Please enter your password to disable 2FA.
AuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
AuthUI.TWO_FACTOR_DESCRIPTION: Please enter your one-time password to continue
AuthUI.SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: Manage your security settings and preferences.
AuthUI.CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Update your password to keep your account secure.
AuthUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_DESCRIPTION: Sign out of all devices except this one.
AuthUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_SUCCESS: Signed out of all devices successfully
AuthUI.SIGN_OUT_ALL_DEVICES_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to sign out of all devices?

AuthUI.SIGN_OUT_OTHER_DEVICES_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to sign out of other devices?
AuthUI.SIGN_OUT_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to sign out?
AuthUI.SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Enter your credentials to sign in to your account.
AuthUI.SIGN_UP_DESCRIPTION: Create an account to get started.
AuthUI.SETTINGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your account settings and preferences.
AuthUI.SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: Manage your active sessions and devices.
AuthUI.SESSIONS_REVOKE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to revoke this session?
AuthUI.SESSIONS_REVOKE_ALL_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to revoke all sessions?

AuthUI.PASSKEY_NOT_SUPPORTED: Passkeys are not supported on this device
AuthUI.PASSKEY_DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
AuthUI.PASSKEY_LIST_DESCRIPTION: Manage your passkeys for secure authentication.
AuthUI.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
AuthUI.RESET_PASSWORD_INSTRUCTIONS: Check your email for password reset instructions.
AuthUI.EMAIL_VERIFICATION_INSTRUCTIONS: Check your email for verification instructions.
